title: r/Entitledparents Give Me Free Food Or I'll Throw Food At You!
description:
r/Entitledparents In today's episode, an entitled Karen completely flips out at a fast food cashier over a freaking ice cream cone. Why on earth would you scream and shout at another human being just because they got you the wrong size ice cream cone? The manager attempts to intervene, and it's a good thing he did, because the Karen THROWS THE ICE CREAM CONE AT THE CASHIER! The manager smacks the cone out of the air like a pro NBA player. Not in my house, Karen! If you like this podcast and you want to see more, follow my podcast for daily Reddit content!
